forcedMarch.title: Forced March
forcedMarch.description: The Travel Pace table assumes that characters travel for 8 hours in day. They can push on beyond that limit, at the risk of exhaustion.
forcedMarch.rules: For each additional hour of travel beyond 8 hours, the characters cover the distance shown for their pace, and each character must make a Constitution saving throw at the end of the hour. The DC is 10 + 1 for each hour past 8 hours. On a failed saving throw, a character suffers one level of exhaustion.

forcedMarch.name: Show Forced March Rules
forcedMarch.hint: Display forced march rules in chat messages when calculating travel time.

useMetric.name: Use Metric System
useMetric.hint: Use metric measurements (m/km) instead of imperial (ft/mi).
